Lyric:
[00:03.55]Come gather 'round people
[00:05.93]Wherever you roam
[00:08.72]And admit that the waters
[00:11.56]Around you have grown
[00:14.22]And accept it that soon
[00:15.60]You'll be drenched to the bone
[00:19.42]If your time to you
[00:22.05]Is worth savin'
[00:24.30]Then you better start swimmin'
[00:26.80]Or you'll sink like a stone
[00:28.38]For the times they are a-changin'.

[00:40.15]Come writers and critics
[00:42.34]Who prophesize with your pen
[00:45.72]And keep your eyes wide
[00:47.28]The chance won't come again
[00:49.61]And don't speak too soon
[00:51.31]For the wheel's still in spin
[00:54.55]And there's no tellin' who
[00:56.90]That it's namin'
[00:58.99]For the loser now
[01:01.13]Will be later to win
[01:03.27]For the times they are a-changin'.

[01:18.86]Come senators, congressmen
[01:21.33]Please heed the call
[01:24.16]Don't stand in the doorway
[01:26.40]Don't block up the hall
[01:28.47]For he that gets hurt
[01:30.28]Will be he who has stalled
[01:33.27]There's a battle outside
[01:35.99]And it is ragin'
[01:37.80]It'll soon shake your windows
[01:39.79]And rattle your walls
[01:41.72]For the times they are a-changin'.

[01:52.29]Come mothers and fathers
[01:54.57]Throughout the land
[01:57.38]And don't criticize
[01:59.53]What you can't understand
[02:01.61]Your sons and your daughters
[02:03.68]Are beyond your command
[02:06.77]Your old road is
[02:08.81]Rapidly agin'
[02:10.94]Please get out of the new one
[02:12.82]If you can't lend your hand
[02:14.99]For the times they are a-changin'.

[02:36.88]The line it is drawn
[02:38.75]The curse it is cast
[02:41.77]The slow one now
[02:43.91]Will later be fast
[02:45.98]As the present now
[02:48.01]Will later be past
[02:51.06]The order is
[02:52.70]Rapidly fadin'
[02:55.24]And the first one now
[02:57.35]Will later be last
[02:59.35]For the times they are a-changin'.
